languages.text: "Все, чего я желала — это стать свободной". {n}Ирлиэт горестно качает головой.{/n} "А стала домашней питомицей. Что ж, по крайней мере на твоем корабле мне гораздо комфортнее, чем в лесах сего мира",

"All I ever wanted was to be free" {n}Yrliet shakes her head in grief.{/n} "And instead I have become a pet. Well, at least I will feel more comfortable in your ship than in the forests of this world."
languages.original_text: "Все, чего я желала — это стать свободной". {n}Ирлиэт горестно качает головой.{/n} "А стала домашней питомицей. Что ж, по крайней мере на твоем корабле мне гораздо комфортнее, чем в лесах сего мира",

traits.locale_text: "All that I ever wanted was to become free" {n}Yrliet sakes her head in grief.{/n} "And ended up becoming a pet. Well, at least I feel more comfortable at your ship than in this world's forests."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "All that I ever wanted was to become free" {n}Yrliet sakes her head in grief.{/n} "And ended up becoming a pet. Well, at least I feel more comfortable at your ship than in this world's forests."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我想要的只有自由。”{n}伊莉耶特悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“可我却成了一只宠物。不过，比起这个世界的丛林，我更愿意待在你的飞船上。”
languages.original_text: "All I ever wanted was to be free" {n}Yrliet shakes her head in grief.{/n} "And instead I have become a pet. Well, at least I will feel more comfortable in your ship than in the forests of this world."

traits.locale_text: “我想要的只有自由。”{n}伊莉耶特悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“可我却成了一只宠物。不过，比起这个世界的丛林，我更愿意待在你的飞船上。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Lo único que siempre he querido es ser libre». {n}Yrliet menea tristemente la cabeza.{/n} «Y en vez de eso, me he convertido en una mascota. En fin, al menos en tu nave me sentiré más cómoda que en los bosques de este mundo».
languages.original_text: "All I ever wanted was to be free" {n}Yrliet shakes her head in grief.{/n} "And instead I have become a pet. Well, at least I will feel more comfortable in your ship than in the forests of this world."

traits.locale_text: «Lo único que siempre he querido es ser libre». {n}Yrliet menea tristemente la cabeza.{/n} «Y en vez de eso, me he convertido en una mascota. En fin, al menos en tu nave me sentiré más cómoda que en los bosques de este mundo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête, pleine de regrets.{/n} « Je voulais seulement être libre... et me voilà devenue une esclave. Au moins, je me sentirai plus à l'aise sur votre vaisseau que dans les forêts de ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "All I ever wanted was to be free" {n}Yrliet shakes her head in grief.{/n} "And instead I have become a pet. Well, at least I will feel more comfortable in your ship than in the forests of this world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête, pleine de regrets.{/n} « Je voulais seulement être libre... et me voilà devenue une esclave. Au moins, je me sentirai plus à l'aise sur votre vaisseau que dans les forêts de ce monde. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Mein einziger Wunsch war immer nur Freiheit." {n}Yrliet schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Und stattdessen bin ich nun ein Haustier. Na ja, immerhin ist es in Eurem Schiff bequemer als in den Wäldern dieser Welt."
languages.original_text: "All I ever wanted was to be free" {n}Yrliet shakes her head in grief.{/n} "And instead I have become a pet. Well, at least I will feel more comfortable in your ship than in the forests of this world."

traits.locale_text: "Mein einziger Wunsch war immer nur Freiheit." {n}Yrliet schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Und stattdessen bin ich nun ein Haustier. Na ja, immerhin ist es in Eurem Schiff bequemer als in den Wäldern dieser Welt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我が望んだのは自由になることだけだった」{n}ユリエットは悲しみに首を振る。{/n}「その代償として我はペットになった。でも…少なくとも、この世界の森にいるよりは、お前の船にいる方が居心地がいい」
languages.original_text: "All I ever wanted was to be free" {n}Yrliet shakes her head in grief.{/n} "And instead I have become a pet. Well, at least I will feel more comfortable in your ship than in the forests of this world."

traits.locale_text: 「我が望んだのは自由になることだけだった」{n}ユリエットは悲しみに首を振る。{/n}「その代償として我はペットになった。でも…少なくとも、この世界の森にいるよりは、お前の船にいる方が居心地がいい」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dilediğim tek şey, özgür olmaktı." {n}Yrliet, kederle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Onun yerine evcil hayvan olup çıktım. En azından senin geminde bu dünyada olduğumdan daha rahat hissedeceğim."
languages.original_text: "All I ever wanted was to be free" {n}Yrliet shakes her head in grief.{/n} "And instead I have become a pet. Well, at least I will feel more comfortable in your ship than in the forests of this world."

traits.locale_text: "Dilediğim tek şey özgür olmaktı." {n}Yrliet, kederle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Onun yerine bir evcil hayvan oldum. En azından senin geminde bu dünyada olduğumdan daha rahat hissedeceğim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
